query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'simulations' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('valorInvestido', 'amortizacaoMetodo', 'valorAporte', 'sistemaAmortizacao')
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2jqMZP8uptaqoP6.root --database neJFcwibfa3kRchdhTVVes --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'simulations' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('valorInvestido', 'amortizacaoMetodo', 'valorAporte', 'sistemaAmortizacao')
